description: The Gulfstream G650 is a flagship ultra-long-range business jet known for its spacious cabin, advanced technology, and exceptional performance. Popular among corporate executives and high-net-worth individuals.
detailingNotes: Requires specialized attention to premium leather seats, exotic wood veneers, and sophisticated avionics displays.

description: The G550 combines long-range capability with a spacious cabin, making it ideal for intercontinental travel. Known for reliability and comfort.
detailingNotes: Focus on high-touch surfaces, galley sanitation, and leather conditioning.

description: The Global 7500 is the world's largest and longest-range business jet, featuring four living spaces and a full-size kitchen.
detailingNotes: Extensive cabin requires thorough deep cleaning, specialized material care, and galley deep sanitation.

description: The Challenger 350 offers a wide-body cabin with exceptional comfort and performance, popular for transcontinental flights.
detailingNotes: Wide cabin allows easy access for deep cleaning. Focus on galley and lavatory sanitation.

description: The Citation Longitude combines performance with comfort, featuring a spacious cabin and advanced avionics.
detailingNotes: Modern materials require gentle cleaning agents. Touchscreen displays need careful attention.

description: The Citation X is the fastest civilian aircraft, offering speed without sacrificing comfort or range.
detailingNotes: Aerodynamic exterior requires careful hand washing. Interior features premium materials.

description: The Phenom 300 is the best-selling light jet, known for its performance, comfort, and advanced technology in a compact package.
detailingNotes: Compact cabin requires efficient detailing approach. Premium leather needs conditioning.

description: The PC-24 Super Versatile Jet features a unique cargo door and can operate from short, unpaved runways while maintaining executive cabin comfort.
detailingNotes: Versatile interior may have cargo area requiring specialized cleaning. Durable materials.

description: The Falcon 8X combines French luxury with cutting-edge technology, featuring three spacious cabin areas and exceptional comfort.
detailingNotes: French luxury materials require specialized care. Premium wood and leather throughout.

description: The G280 offers exceptional range and performance in the super-midsize category, with Gulfstream's signature quality and comfort.
detailingNotes: Gulfstream quality materials require premium cleaning products and techniques.
